data.lyric:
[ti:It's The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year (1963)]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:Here Comes Santa Claus]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year (1963) - Andy Williams (安迪·威廉姆斯)
[00:03.77]Lyrics by：Andy Williams
[00:07.54]Composed by：Andy Williams
[00:11.32]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:18.34]With the kids jingle belling
[00:20.30]And everyone telling you be of good cheer
[00:25.27]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:32.49]It's the hap-happiest season of all
[00:39.52]With those holiday greetings
[00:41.58]And gay happy meetings when friends come to call
[00:46.59]It's the hap-happiest season of all
[00:53.79]There'll be parties for hosting
[00:55.66]Marshmallows for toasting
[00:57.44]And caroling out in the snow
[01:00.67]There'll be scary ghost stories
[01:02.69]And tales of the glories
[01:04.41]Of Christmases long long ago
[01:09.54]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:16.69]There'll be much mistletoeing
[01:18.71]And hearts will be glowing when loved ones are near
[01:23.86]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:38.47]There'll be parties for hosting
[01:40.22]Marshmallows for toasting
[01:42.00]And caroling out in the snow
[01:45.39]There'll be scary ghost stories
[01:47.36]And tales of the glories
[01:49.07]Of Christmases long long ago
[01:58.05]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[02:05.22]There'll be much mistletoeing
[02:07.14]And hearts will be glowing when loved ones are near
[02:12.21]It's the most wonderful time
[02:15.59]It's the most wonderful time
[02:19.28]All the most wonderful time of the year
data.trans:
[ti:It's The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year (1963)]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:Here Comes Santa Claus]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:03.77]//
[00:07.54]//
[00:11.32]这是一年中最美好的时光
[00:18.34]和孩子们一起欢呼雀跃
[00:20.30]每个人都叫你振作起来
[00:25.27]这是一年中最美好的时光
[00:32.49]这是最快乐的季节
[00:39.52]带着节日的问候
[00:41.58]朋友来找我的时候我们欢聚一堂
[00:46.59]这是最快乐的季节
[00:53.79]我们会举办派对
[00:55.66]烤面包用的棉花糖
[00:57.44]在雪地里唱颂歌
[01:00.67]会有可怕的鬼故事
[01:02.69]讲述着荣耀的故事
[01:04.41]想起很久以前的圣诞节
[01:09.54]这是一年中最美好的时光
[01:16.69]到处都是槲寄生
[01:18.71]当爱的人靠近时心会容光焕发
[01:23.86]这是一年中最美好的时光
[01:38.47]我们会举办派对
[01:40.22]烤面包用的棉花糖
[01:42.00]在雪地里唱颂歌
[01:45.39]会有可怕的鬼故事
[01:47.36]讲述着荣耀的故事
[01:49.07]想起很久以前的圣诞节
[01:58.05]这是一年中最美好的时光
[02:05.22]到处都是槲寄生
[02:07.14]当爱的人靠近时心会容光焕发
[02:12.21]这是最美好的时光
[02:15.59]这是最美好的时光
[02:19.28]一年中最美好的时光
